Info.Description: This module describes the common data elements for TAVR Aortic Root Measurements use case.

NumericDataElement.Label: Best systolic phase
NumericDataElement.Hint: Systolic phase with the least motion artifact. Percentage of cardiac cycle in systole

NumericDataElement.Label: Best diastolic phase
NumericDataElement.Hint: Diastolic phase with the least motion artifact. Percentage of cardiac cycle in diastole

NumericDataElement.Label: Aortic annulus maximum diameter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Aortic annulus maximum diameter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Aortic annulus minimum diameter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Aortic annulus minimum diameter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Aortic annulus perimeter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Aortic annulus perimeter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Aortic annulus area
NumericDataElement.Hint: Aortic annulus area (mm2)

NumericDataElement.Label: LVOT 3mm below the annulus minimum diameter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Left ventricular outflow tract (LVOT) 3 mm below the annulus minimum diameter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: LVOT 3mm below the annulus maximum diameter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Left ventricular outflow tract (LVOT) 3 mm below the annulus maximum diameter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: LVOT 3mm below the annulus perimeter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Left ventricular outflow tract (LVOT) 3 mm below the annulus perimeter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: LVOT 3mm below the annulus area in diastole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Left ventricular outflow tract (LVOT) 3 mm below the annulus area (mm2)

NumericDataElement.Label: Sinotubular junction minimum diameter in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Sinotubular junction minimum diameter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Sinotubular junction maximum diameter in diastole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Sinotubular junction maximum diameter (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Right coronary height minimum
NumericDataElement.Hint: Height from aortic annulus to bottom of the right coronary artery origin (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Right coronary height maximum
NumericDataElement.Hint: Height from aortic annulus to top of the right coronary artery origin (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Left coronary height minimum
NumericDataElement.Hint: Height from aortic annulus to bottom of the left coronary artery origin (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Left coronary height maximum
NumericDataElement.Hint: Height from the aortic annulus to the top of the left coronary artery origin (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Aortic valve calcium score
NumericDataElement.Hint: Agatston calcium score of aortic valve (Agatston score)

NumericDataElement.Label: AV angle in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: aortic valve angle (degrees)

NumericDataElement.Label: Annulus to apex curved length
NumericDataElement.Hint: Distance from aortic annulus to apex of the left ventricle curved in ventricle (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Annulus to apex straight length in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Distance from aortic annulus to apex of the left ventricle with a straight line (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Left ventricle width in systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Width of left ventricle in systole (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Approximate deployment angle
NumericDataElement.Hint: Angle to optimize visualization of the 3 cusps of the aortic valve (degrees)
